com.bizosys.hsearch.filter
Class TermFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.filter.TermFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
public class TermFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.hadoop.hbase.filter.Filter

Finds the documents containing the search terms. It operates on the hash codec of the term.

Author:
karan
